author: adriano

comments.content: Hmm.. Well, it looks like ' [Univers Ultra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518053203/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/49-light-ultra-condensed/testdrive.html?s=study+of+motion&p=72)', to me..
